title: Turn on or turn off an automatic message for a Business Account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: A short-term access token authorized by the TikTok Business Account owner. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: auto_message_type
parameters.description: The type of automatic message. Enum values: WELCOME_MESSAGE : welcome message. A welcome message is a message that is automatically sent to a user when they start a direct message conversation with you. SUGGESTED_QUESTION : suggested question. A suggested question is a frequently asked question displayed at the beginning of a chat. When the user selects a suggested question, the user will automatically receive the corresponding preset answer. Note : If you use this value, all the existing suggestion questions will be disabled. CHAT_PROMPT : chat prompt. A chat prompt is an interactive button displayed above the input box. When users tap a chat prompt, the system will automatically generate a corresponding question for users to start the conversation. Note : If you use this value, all the existing chat prompts will be disabled.

parameters.name: operation_status
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the type of automatic message. Enum values: ENABLE : To turn on the type of automatic message. DISABLE : To turn off the type of automatic message.
